entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
